ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Helped guide my thesis ideas and provided me structure for submitting on time
How to perform a long term research project

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Clearer guidelines about soft vs. hard deadlines and when attendance is required vs. encouraged would have been helpful, but overall a great class!
It was a great class. Good organization

Strength is the timeline. The thesis was broken down into different aspects of research and writing that were expected to be completed by specific dates. I liked peer collaboration

Weakness sometimes since we let our early it felt like a waste of time to walk to class just to leave early if people didnt have updates/questions

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Its required for the major so yes. It was an overall very positive experience even though my personal thesis writing wa a chaotic
